snippet: Jeff Gordon felt as if his hopes were slipping away when Nascar red-flagged his last chance to get into the playoffs because of rain at Richmond International Raceway.
abstract: Jeff Gordon takes the final spot in the Chase for the Sprint Cup.
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon felt as if his hopes were slipping away when Nascar red-flagged his last chance to get into the playoffs because of rain at Richmond International Raceway.
